text:
Depreciation expense is lower by $100,000 each year ($1,600,000 – $1,500,000) for
the first 15 years without the component method. However, at the end of Year 15,
Global will spend $3,000,000 to replace the interior. Thus, additional depreciation
expense of $3,000,000 / 15 years = $200,000 each year is required for the last 15 years
of the asset's life.
